text: Control of the Eastern Shores Weakens
We have lost a region off the eastern shores of Lustria, we must take it back at all costs.
A settlement in Eatine has fallen to our enemies, we must act now.
Asuryan's blessings, you have done what most thought impossible, tame the Eastern Shores of Lustria. You have upheld your families great name Stormrider, we wait to see what great feat you face next.
A large force has been spotted from the Crow's nest, man the decks and prepare our defences!

Lord Finrian, admiral of the Dragonship Ingranion has successfully navigated through the treacherous seas leaving a trail of floating scoundrels behind them. They have brought us fresh supplies and some of the finest Asuryan marines, but no sooner had they docked had they set sail, returning to Eatine.
We have found several Sentinels savaged with others still unaccounted for, be alert, for something lurks in the shadows and it has a taste for Asur-flesh!
